{"id":950396900,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1684092872,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/950396900/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Convert an Array Into a 2D Array With Conditions","memory":"29.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> findMatrix(vector<int>& nums) {\n        unordered_map<int,int> freq;\n        for(int i:nums)\n        freq[i]++;\n        int max_freq=0;\n        for(auto it:freq)\n        max_freq=it.second>max_freq?it.second:max_freq;\n        vector<vector<int>> ans(max_freq);\n        for(int i=0;i<max_freq;i++){\n            for(auto it:freq){\n                if(it.second>i)\n                ans[i].push_back(it.first);\n            }\n        }\n        return(ans);        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"convert-an-array-into-a-2d-array-with-conditions","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
